header.content: General-purpose filesystem API with batch orchestration capability.
{bold API-Level Defaults}: Parameters set at API level inherit to all methods in batch pipeline
{bold Batch Mode}: Use --batch with array of operations for pipeline execution

value.name: batch
value.description: JSON array of batch operations to execute in pipeline

value.name: encoding
value.description: Default file encoding for read/write operations (utf8, binary, base64, etc.)

value.name: stats
value.description: Default flag for including detailed file statistics in list operations

value.name: overwrite
value.description: Default flag for allowing file overwriting in copy/move operations

value.name: errorMode
value.description: Error handling mode for batch operations (fail-fast, continue)
